fields.description: Primary emotional presentation or mental-health need.
Triggers, phobias, or contraindications to avoid.

scoring.description: Gemini calculates cosine-style similarity between user intent tags and destination matchingProfile tags plus numeric penalties for contraindications and budget/energy mismatches.
hardStops: If sensitivities overlap clinician contraindications, drop destination
If desired budget tier < destination cost bucket by more than 1 level, mark as fallback

geminiMatching.promptTemplate: Given the user emotional brief and the destination catalog, produce top 3 matches by summarizing why each destination fits, referencing matchingProfile fields. Respond with JSON matching {recommendations:[{destinationId,fitReasoning,confidence}]}.
llmContextHints: Emotion tags and modality tags are lower-case kebab-case tokens; partial matches count.
Energy score contains both numeric score and activation bucket.
Use clinician and accessibility summaries to filter for safety needs.
